+
+# Copyright 2019-2021 Azul Systems, Inc.  All Rights Reserved.

+#

+# CA 94089 USA or visit www.azul.com if you need additional information or
+# have any questions.
+
+
+##
+## @test Test1.sh
+## @summary verify that SHA1PRNG secure random is reseeded after restore if
+##  initialized with default seed
+## @compile Test1.java
+## @run shell/timeout=60 Test.sh
+##
+
+set -x
+
+export TESTJAVA=/home/parallels/Work/CRAC/jdk
+export TESTCLASSPATH=.
+
+set +e
+for test in `seq 0 1`
+do
+
+    ${TESTJAVA}/bin/java -cp ${TESTCLASSPATH} -XX:CRaCCheckpointTo=cr Test1 $test
+    e=$?
+
+    [ $e -eq 137 ]
+
+    ${TESTJAVA}/bin/java -cp ${TESTCLASSPATH} -XX:CRaCRestoreFrom=cr Test1 $test
+    e1=$?
+
+    ${TESTJAVA}/bin/java -cp ${TESTCLASSPATH} -XX:CRaCRestoreFrom=cr Test1 $test
+    e2=$?
+
+    if [ $test == "0" ]; then
+        if [ $e1 == $e2 ]; then
+            echo FAILED
+            exit 1
+        fi
+    else 
+        if [ $e1 != $e2 ]; then
+            echo FAILED
+            exit 1
+        fi
+    fi
+done
+echo PASSED
